text: President Obama tells a news conference that any agreement to reduce the US deficit is going to require tough decisions.
Wall Street investors are confident that Greece will avoid default despite protests in Athens.
Microsoft introduces Office 365, its biggest push yet into the mobile, Internet - accessible world of cloud computing.
The US wins two - zero over North Korea in Women's World Cup Soccer putting the US at the top of Group C.
The latest Transformers film premieres in New York with actors Shia LaBeouf and Josh Duhamel.
